website_summaries.verdict: A quality, durable, well-made  hair brush. Highly recommended, as long as you can get used to the handle-less design.
pros: Hand-finished beechwood brush with white natural bristles
Intended for hair care, not styling
Measures 5 x 2 and 3/4 inches with 1/2-inch bristles
cons: Bristles come out after each use

customer_reviews.title: The last brush you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason Kent has been around for over 200 years, and that reason is quality. The person I bought this for had to finally replace their brush after 40 years, and they were elated to get essentially the same brush, in the same style, but with white boar bristles instead of black, to match the graying of their hair.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hairbrush. Quality materials. Easy to hold. Firm bristles. Makes my hair shine. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Parmenter

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much anyone could love a hairbrush until now. This is a far cry from the utilitarian brushes that are out there. The quality justifies the price.
customer_reviews.author: JasonDavid

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality, useful
customer_reviews.text: The hairbrush is authentic. And looks to be excellent quality. The bristles are pretty stiff, which works for my hair and scalp. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Angelito

customer_reviews.title: Last Brush I'll Ever Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've tried multiple brands of boars hair brushes over the years and this one takes the cake! Bristles are super coarse and fantastic for penetrating larger and thicker beards. Might buy a second for travel or my car, but doubt I'll ever seek out a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Geromy C

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush. Should last forever
customer_reviews.text: Stiffish bristles, but not scalp removing. Nice brush. Should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Royalty and military Generals will be pleased! As would anyone that desires this style brush
customer_reviews.text: Royalty and military Generals will be pleased! As would anyone that desires this style brush! Quality that can be felt, seen in results, and passed to future generations!
customer_reviews.author: ezb

customer_reviews.title: reliability
customer_reviews.text: I gave this hairbrush as a Christmas gift to my grandson. He says he likes it. Not used to no handle though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this everyday and love the feeling on my scalp while using this
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and love the feeling on my scalp while using this. Fit is perfect in hand. Easily shapes and manages my thick hair. I also use it on my beard to avoid having errant/rogue hairs when I have to look well kept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but give it some time.
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure how I felt about the brush. It is packaged wonderfully and feels "quality", but my hair didn't take to it at first. It didn't look much different than any regular brush. (I have thick hair). After a few days it settled down and now looks and feels fantastic. I've also learned how to use it. Highly recommend buying it it, and I suggest playing with it for a week if you are used to using whatever brush you found in the bathroom. I've stopped using hair holding products with this brush...Unless I put off a haircut too long and not much can save me then anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kinkaid

customer_reviews.title: High quality brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, high quality brush. I've been using Kent combs for years. This one is a little large for my hand, I will probably try a smaller one and pass this on to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound

customer_reviews.title: easiness of holding/good bristles
customer_reviews.text: this is my second kent brush in thirty years (the same). i gave away the first, still in good shape, implored by a family member to give it to them!
customer_reviews.author: Barney R

customer_reviews.title: KENT is the Best In The Biz
customer_reviews.text: KENT is, by far, one of the best companies that create hair combs. Not only does it feel fantastic when I brush my hair... It is an experience that is cool and wonderful every single time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: William Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, I had one before and lost it. So glad to get another
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush for the price. Very high quality. I thought the bristles were a little stiff at first but after a few days I stopped noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a quality men's hair brush
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a quality men's hair brush. Some reviews said that it develops a black film or that the bristles fall out. I haven't seen either of these so far. I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: maulepilot

customer_reviews.title: I love this hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairbrush! It fits perfectly in my hand and feels great on my head and beard. Great design and function.
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice brush!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good quality wood Handle and stiff bristles. The package showed up a little dinged up but that doesn’t matter to me. I have medium length hair, makes it look nice and shiny! Feels great on my scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: Just feels good. I use it as a beard brush and my hair now has a shine to it. It lays where I want it to. The brush is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: wash only as recommended, I keep mine in the box when transporting
customer_reviews.text: Stiff bristles (but not too stiff), works as advertised, wash only as recommended, I keep mine in the box when transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality hair brush for thick, wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good brush, worth every cent, but because the bristles are relatively stiff and widely separated it is more appropriate for thick, wavy hair than for my thin, straight hair. For this reason, and not for reasons of quality or flaws, I returned it. I would recommend it for younger men, or those with thick, curly or wavy hair, but not for those of us with thinning, thin, or very straight hair or those with short, soft hair. Of course, as with all such opinions, your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: dbTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The brush is exactly what I wanted I bought the same brush for my husband probably 10 years ago finally wore out this is identical to the one that he had excellent brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brush on my beard for over a year now. Feels amazing, & has never lost a bristle. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these brushes for over 50 years. They last almost forever and have never found one that it's equal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: For the money I’m a bit disappointed. The brush isn’t as durable as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Curry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality brush. Perfect feel against the scalp, I liked the double length bristle which enhances the brushing action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old Kent brush that was 27 years old. Just felt it was time for a new one! A terrific mens brush for hair and beard.
customer_reviews.author: chromer

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised. Delivery spot on. Very nice product. Nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush I've Owned!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and brush was better than expected. Bristle don't fall out and brush has a nice heft it.
customer_reviews.author: panos

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Highest quality. Been buying Kent products for 50 years...always the best!
customer_reviews.author: Max McConkey

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality with finger grips, attractive wood and excellent quality bristles. Would highly recommend. My husband was very pleased with his Christmas gift. The best hair brush he has ever owned. Congratulations on producing such excellent quality. Quality always appeals and sells. Would highly recommend.....
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gall

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality men's hair brush; beautifully made. Staggered bristle length works well for those with "thinning" hair
customer_reviews.author: PhiSci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband has short thick hair and loves this brush
customer_reviews.author: sue granskie

customer_reviews.title: Recipient was pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Recipient was pleased with the product. I was pleased with the shipping promptness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality! It is a solid choice for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality! It is a solid choice for a men's hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Micah65

customer_reviews.title: good quality brush
customer_reviews.text: good quality brush,fine craftsmenship. takes a little getting used to bristles but once you do makes your hair look great.
customer_reviews.author: steven forman

customer_reviews.title: Best hair brush he's ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The brush is the real deal. Was a birthday gift and he was very pleased with it. Does a great job on his hair & is very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this brush, instant waves and gorgeous packaging!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Moody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A high quality brush at an economy price. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: John Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Even tho this is new and I am just getting used to it I really like the brush. It fits the hand well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Yahns

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Just the best quality. I couldn't be happier. The entire Kent line is for those that are looking for the finest grooming products around.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Hutsko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely murder on bedhead, and it feels great on my scalp. On the other hand, it turns my short curly hair into a frizzball. So, I'm keeping my (very cheap) old Phillips brush of the same style for finishing: the Phillips' soft bristles aren't sufficient to reach the scalp or straighten out a mess but work great for smoothing.
customer_reviews.author: AHK

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kent Brush
customer_reviews.text: This Kent brush is the quality you would expect from the manufacturer. Feels great in your hand and tames even the wildest hair. I purchased this brush for my beard and it works wonders. The only draw back is that the bristles are not as soft as I thought they would be. Thus is not worth a four star review as the stiffness works well at exfoliating the dead skin cells leaving my face looking younger.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality; High Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is evident. Although it's difficult to justify spending so much on a hair brush, I bought this under the assumption that it will be the last brush I'll need to buy for decades. It won't quite reach the scalp on the top of your head if you have thick, long hair on top, but it massages the scalp well otherwise. The bristles are firm, but they don't feel like sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: Graybeard

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Great Brushing Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Lost a star for the late delivery but the product is fantastic for my hair type (thicker). It's bigger than I thought it would be, which is great. I can palm a basketball and the brush is very comfortable to hold. The bristles themselves are firm but soft enough. It's early days as I've only used it twice but it's a great quality brush from what I can gather so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Pepi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Harder bristles than I had expected, based on other Kent brushes I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brush for my 360 waves. It has definitely improved my wave pattern. The bristles are firm and stiff, which is awesome for my type of hair. If you put a stopper in the sink run some hot water you could soften the bristles on the brush. This was my first Kent brush that I purchased and have brought another brush in which I absolutely love as well. Both brushes have great pull on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Derek greg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush as a replacement for one I received as a gift years ago and left in a hotel room. The brush is a little pricey but worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Docpivot

customer_reviews.title: Are you a gentleman?
customer_reviews.text: It's a brush. But it's classy, very functional, and very, very well made! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: William Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Brush.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold. Outstanding quality. Very effective. My wife - who has extremely thick hair - keeps borrowing it. I may buy her one!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis A. Weaver Jr.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent waste of money
customer_reviews.text: An excellent waste of money. There are cheaper brushes that will keep your beard in fine shape, but with the levelm of prestige this brush imparts, I would expect it to be priced twice as high.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bremer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old son. Totally crazy i know, but I wanted him to have one like his grandpa. I figured if his lasted for over 30 years then this too should last. FYI there was nothing wrong with my dads, my mom just threw it out when he died.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Giving as a gift. One of several I have purchased over time.
customer_reviews.author: James L Naughton

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my beard and hair
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my beard and hair. Ever since I got it and started using it(when dry/with oil), my hair and beard grows noticeably less wild and feels better. I stopped using it for a week, and started to see the usual wild curls coming back. I clean it from hairs once a few days by running my comb through it.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal

customer_reviews.title: Kent brushes are the truth
customer_reviews.text: This brush can go deep and it massages your scalp at the same time bringing out the natural oils in your hair. Lost a few bristles, not complaining. Yeah it costs a grip, but I haven't found another brush that matches it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ware

customer_reviews.title: It turned black !
customer_reviews.text: This brush seemed at first to be the same high quality Kent brush I've ordered over the years. However when exposed to just a little moisture, the wood turned an ugly black ! As I have never had this problem before, I wonder if there is some new process or element that has been added to the wood that is causing it to blacken. Any information would b appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Griffin Lefer

customer_reviews.title: Wave-Breaker
customer_reviews.text: The brush does not lay the hair down. It actual acts like a comb, and raises the hair up. Maybe it will get better as the bristles soften some. Even if that happens, the brush is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush for Asian male hair
customer_reviews.text: For months I've admired the K-pop locks of my male Korean friend. Somehow he's able to keep longer hair in beautiful form. I've never been able to use hair gel or hair styling products because it irritates my skin and takes too much work. This brush substitutes for that and allows my hair to hold form without any artificial products, with just a few brushes a day. Literally life-changing and one of the best products I've ever bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Better than a comb
customer_reviews.text: After the first use I trashed my comb. Sometimes you get a feeling about products; the feeling here is nothing short of awesome. The bristles don't irritate my scalp, but do an excellent job styling my hair. I hope this brush lasts a long time for me, as it did for another reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Men's Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush does a better job of controlling my hair than any other hairbrush that I have used. Cicerosecundus
customer_reviews.author: Cicerosecundus

customer_reviews.title: Best hair brush I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of brush that I like. Good quality, Good price ad does a good job. I highly recommend This product.
customer_reviews.author: Agee A Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, but it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brush, quality is great and it does what it is suppose to. The only thing I will say is that it is a little pricey and there may be cheaper options, but when buying online it can be hard to figure out what you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: If you've got a mustache or a beard...
customer_reviews.text: Just splurge and buy this. It just puts lesser brushes to shame, and you'll feel very good that you have the best.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Fogey

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Fits hand well. Bristles are just right; not to firm not too soft. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jay

customer_reviews.title: Kent brushes numbah one
customer_reviews.text: Stiff bristles. Great for itchy scalp. You don't need to rub hard to maximize benefit. Better than finger nails, actually.
customer_reviews.author: Gates43

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these now. One for travel and the other for home. Great for my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Tomtex

customer_reviews.title: This is a good hairbrush. It feels a little though on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hairbrush. It feels a little though on my beard because of its bristles, my beard is too short and it hurts my skin. I recommend it for men who have long beards and hair and women too!!
customer_reviews.author: Raelo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Great for my short hair. Massages and invigorates the scalp, gets rid of dandruff and feels great overall. Small enough to fit in my travel bag. Quality is typical Kent. Their shaving brush is the best in my collection and I have quite a few shaving brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product that is well worth the cost. This is the second one I have bought for my husband. The first one lasted over 5 years before needing to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush You Can Get
customer_reviews.text: Best hair brush I have ever had. I have big hands and this brush fits my hand perfectly. The bristles massage your scalp as you brush your hair. Love this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Madden

customer_reviews.title: Great beard brush
customer_reviews.text: After buying this as a beard brush I don't think I could go without. Also recommend their combs highly.
customer_reviews.author: Travis J. Slate

customer_reviews.title: A perfect hair brush
customer_reviews.text: I love my new brush. I had a Kent hair brush which, after about 40 years of daily use, was beginning to get a bit tired. The solid construction of this brush makes me think that it will outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: dog guy

customer_reviews.title: It's a kent product...need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...expect many years of great usage. The bristles are stiff at first, but expect them to soften up in time. Definitely a must get item.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Kent makes great brushes
customer_reviews.text: Kent brushes are the best I have found. I have been buying them for over 30 years. This was an extra brush I purchased for a travel kit.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Quality Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Well built product with excellent bristles and sturdy wood handle. I subtracted one star because of the grip. While the handle has indentations to provide a finger hold, I found the indentations a bit too narrow for a really secure grip (I do not have particularly large hands).
customer_reviews.author: retiredshopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hairbrush. Easy on the scalp and no bristle fallout problem,
customer_reviews.author: Rambler T

customer_reviews.title: This hairbrush is great. I now can style my hair(Dude with 3-4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush is great. I now can style my hair(Dude with 3-4 inch hair) in many different ways. This brush is way better than the comb I had before. I can't wait to give it to my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weaver

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know some people are looking at the price of this brush and asking "why would I/should I pay so much for a brush but I can honestly say that the MG3 is worth the money if ur about grooming . It works for me when I'm wolfin/letting my hair grow for deeper more refined waves.
customer_reviews.author: mr.pnutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beard brush for medium to long beards. Very firm bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Ninad Ghody

customer_reviews.title: Jest right
customer_reviews.text: This brush is jest right. When I got it I thought it was a little stiff, but that thought disappeared. And when it wears out I'll buy a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Very tough bristles but this brush is definitely high quality. Satisfied with my purchase, my beard especially feels a lot softer.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel in the hand, good quality wood handle, nice bristle, and works well in the mane. Searched for exactly this style and like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: AutumnSunset

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Brush
customer_reviews.text: A replacement for one I have used for over 25 years. Great brush.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: I have used these brushed most of my life. It is just what I prefer. I bought one from the Kent website a couple of years ago and it was much more than I paid on Amazon. I am really pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grooming..not styling
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush..great for grooming not stlying..feels good on my scalp
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sorrels

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality brush.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for 360 waves and it works like a charm. I use it everyday. I'd consider this a medium brush. If you're waving you'd want a harder brush for when you're wolfing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Kent MG3 Oval White Bristle Hair Brush
customer_reviews.text: This hair brush is just what I was expecting. It is a very good quality brush and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler Michele

customer_reviews.title: High Quality but over priced
customer_reviews.text: The brush is definitely a high quality brush. The wood is solid and the bristles are very strong but not too stiff. That being said, a lot of the bristles come out after each use and this thing is really hard to clean. I have pretty short hair (about 1 inch long) and the hairs get completely tangled in there and its really hard to clean. Also, I bought it because everyone spoke of the high quality and they were not wrong, but now that I think about it, how much better can a $40 brush be compared to a $10 one?
customer_reviews.author: S. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Much more reasonable than retail stores
customer_reviews.text: Just a good brush at a reasonable price, easy less than Bloomies but at least as good. I've had two for more than thirty years.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Loebelson

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Good brush in quality and wholeness of materials, bristles are a good length -not too short, firm bristles really combs through the hair nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and keep this brush in my toiletry kit. It is the highest quality brush I have ever owned and is worth the price. Solidly made it should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: johnj

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mixture of bristles and some are too stiff for my head.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C. Leet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality. Exactly as described, all natural, unblemished, and quite comfortable even for thin hair and sensitive scalp. Would buy again good value. Comparable English brushes cost quite a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: RLRees

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hair brush. Great feel in your hand. Too bad I don't have more hair to fully enjoy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: George W. Cawman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush is no better than a $3 walmart brush. Not worth the money, totally overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've always used two Kent brushed, one for each hand, and just assumed they came as a pair, so was disappointed when only one arrived. I've had two previous sets over 60 years that were used daliy so I suspect this will be my last Kent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Jorgensen

product_meta.title: Kent MG3 Finest Men's Hair Brush & Beard Brush for Skin Care - 100% Natural White Boar Bristle Brush for Mens Grooming, Scalp Brush, 360 Wave, and Beard Straightener For Men's Hair Care
product_meta.description: Size:MG3WHAT HAIR LENGTH & TYPE? - Suitable for all hair and beard lengths. The firm bristles are best for medium to coarse hair types. ADVANTAGES: Brushing with natural bristles improves circulation in the scalp which is perfect for stimulating the hair's natural oils to be distributed through the hair keeping it clean, shiny & naturally conditioned. BENEFITS: For healthier and naturally shiny hair, this lifetime lasting travel hairbrush will make it easy for you to tame and groom all your hair and beard needs. ABOUT KENT’s - FINEST MEN LINE: Designs come in various shapes, oval, rectangular and both with handles. HANDFINISHED to perfection and made from finest timbers in the world. The natural bristles are carefully sourced, and tailor cut specifically, to offer different strengths for thick, medium, fine or receding hair. Finest Men's brushes include the Kent MC4, Kent MG3, Kent MS11, Kent MN11, Kent MS23D, Kent MS23, Kent MG2, Kent MN1B, Kent OG2, Kent OG4, Kent OS11, Kent OE1, Kent OG1, Kent OG3, and the Kent OS18.
feature_bullets: TRAVEL BRUSH DIMENSIONS: 5” x 2.5” x 1.5” (12.5cm x 7cm x 4 cm), with .875" (2cm) Bristle; Beechwood base made to fit in the palm of your hand, the perfect travel size hair brush! Suitable for all hair and beard lengths. The firm bristles are best for medium to coarse hair types.

THE PERFECT GIFT: This boar hair brush is the perfect gift for that special someone, giving them an essential piece of the beard kit for men that they've been looking for - or just a beard brush for men's daily grooming and beard grooming. Consider gift packaging this Holiday Season, Valentines Day, or an upcoming Birthday

PERFECT SKIN CARE SCALP BRUSH: This boar bristle brush helps spread the natural hair oil produced by your skin; removes dirt, prevents thinning hair, and promotes hair regrowth. Its cleansing properties make it an essential part of any hair grooming kit or beard kit.

AN AGELESS LUXURY: The Kent Brand has been making beard combs for men since the 18th century, providing quality boar bristle brushes and the essentials for mens grooming since their inception. This boar brush makes for a classic and unique gift for your special someone.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Kent manufactures the largest selection of the finest hair brushes and beard kits worldwide. If you aren't satisfied with the quality of our royal brush, feel free to return it for a refund. We believe that beard grooming for men is a lifestyle and fashion statement, and we are always designing new models to try and meet the demands of our consumers - if our product doesn't meet your standards, it doesn't meet ours.
